Posts.Content: Mar 6, 2015 04:16PM vr423 wrote: Anyone who had FEC chemo, at what point did you lose your hair?
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: vr423 wrote: I'm 39, and there is no breast cancer in my family. But I was scared when my husband commented that my breast looked puckered or dimpled and i found a lump. Had a clinical exam followed by mammogram and ultrasound. Called back the same day and told radiologist believes "high likelihood of malignancy" my biopsy is tomorrow, I'm scared & wondering what I need to prepare myself for Surgery 12/22/2014 Mastectomy: Right Chemotherapy 2/25/2015 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Ellence (epirubicin), Fluorouracil (5-fluorouracil, 5-FU, Adrucil), Taxotere (docetaxel) Dx ILC, 2cm, Stage IIA, 1/20 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Hormonal Therapy Radiation Therapy Breast, Lymph nodes Targeted Therapy Herceptin (trastuzumab) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mammogram & Ultrasound "worrisome"- biopsy tomorrow vr423 Meadow
